mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, E.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT x.ex_no, u.nick, x.ex_content,x.ex_date, x.file_no XX , u.file_no UU, FX.file_no FFXX, FU.file_no FFUU, FX.origin_name AS PIC, FX.stored_name AS PICTURE, FU.origin_name AS PRO, FU.stored_name AS PROFILE, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_comm WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) AS comm , (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_like WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) AS heart FROM tb_extagram x LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user u ON x.user_no = u.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FX ON x.file_no = FX.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FU ON u.file_no = FU.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_comm c ON x.ex_no = c.ex_post_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_like l ON x.ex_no = l.ex_post_no ORDER BY x.ex_no DESC ) E ) tb_extagram WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_no, u.nick, x.ex_no, x.ex_date, x.ex_content, x.ex_date, x.file_no XX , u.file_no UU, FX.file_no FFXX, FU.file_no FFUU, FX.origin_name AS PIC, FX.stored_name As PICTURE, FU.origin_name AS PRO, FU.stored_name AS PROFILE, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_comm WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) As comm, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_like WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) As heart FROM tb_extagram X LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user u ON x.user_no = u.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FX ON x.file_no = FX.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FU ON u.file_no = FU.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_comm c ON x.ex_no = c.ex_post_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_like l ON x.ex_no = l.ex_post_no WHERE ex_no = #{exNo }

SELECT u.file_no, u.nick, c.ex_comm, c.ex_comm_no, c.ex_comm_date, f.stored_name, f.origin_name, c.ex_post_no FROM tb_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.file_no = u.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_comm c ON u.user_no = c.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_extagram x ON x.ex_no = c.ex_post_no WHERE ex_no = #{exNo} ORDER BY ex_comm_date DESC
